basics.name: Daniel Ilies
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Full-Stack Engineer with experience in Java, C#, and diverse web technologies. Skilled in international Scrum teams, software development, testing, and cross-functional project delivery. Fluent in English and passionate about agile methodologies and software quality.

work.name: TGW Logistics Group
highlights: Work in international and cross-functional Scrum teams using Java, C#, Oracle, and related technologies
Oversee development projects from conception through implementation, testing, and on-site commissioning
Ensure software quality through JUnit testing and in-house/client-side testing environments

work.name: DevelBox
highlights: Led frontend refactoring and migration using Vue.js and Vuetify
Engineered ML-integrated solutions with TensorFlow and TensorFlow.js
Developed automation tools and machine learning infrastructure
